casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Patty MEADOWS 400PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2018 Michael E. Casterline, Attorney at Law, for Meadows, Patty. Daniel Snipes Johnson, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 8th of June 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 11th day of July 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
